price: Siku ambayo rafiki hatamfaa rafiki yake kwa chochote, wala hawatanusuriwa.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي مَوۡلًى عَن مَّوۡلٗى شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
footnotes: Siku ambayo jamaa hawezi kumtetea jamaa yake, wala rafiki kumtetea rafiki yake kwa lolote, hata kwa uchache wa adhabu. Wala wao hawatanusuriwa nafsi zao mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī mawlan ʿan mawlan shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
